Class Game

java.lang.Object
base.Game
public class Game extends Object
Main game controller for the JEST card game. Manages players, deck, trophies, rounds, and scoring.

Game flow:

  1. Setup: Initialize players (human and AI), deck, draw trophy cards
  2. Rounds: Deal 2 cards, make offers, take cards (repeat until deck empty)
  3. Final: Collect remaining offer cards, award trophies to Jests, calculate scores
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numberOfPlayers, int numberOfHumans, int aiDifficulty)
      Creates a new game with the specified player configuration.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - Total number of players (3 or 4)
      numberOfHumans - Number of human players (1 to numberOfPlayers)
      aiDifficulty - AI difficulty (1=Defensive, 2=Offensive, 3=Mixed)
